## Hardware Specifications

Since the Sovereign AI Fleet runs on high-performance local rigs, please provide your hardware specs:

- **CPU**: (e.g., AMD Ryzen 9 9950X3D)

- **Storage**: (e.g., 2TB NVMe SSD)
- **Operating System**: (e.g., Ubuntu 24.04 LTS)
